title: Design, Build, Fly: Airplane Drone for International Competition
description: Leading the computational simulation, electronics management, and safety as the VP of Cooper Union’s AIAA team to compete against over 100 teams worldwide.
company: American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics (AIAA) Design/Build/Fly (DBF)

title: AirShare: Improving Airflow Between Rooms with the Door Closed
description: I co-invented AirShare, a novel fan that promotes air circulation between two rooms even when the door is closed, saving thousands of kilowatts in heating and cooling.

title: CardboardTests
description: I co-founded CardboardTests, a platform for students to create and share exam-like test questions. CBT gives access to test-like problems for students all around the world regardless of financial status or race.

title: This Website
description: This personal website was designed and created from scratch using Vue.js and maintained using GitHub Pages.

title: COVID-19 Document Formatter
description: I created a user-friendly application that cut document formatting time from 8 HOURS to 20 MINUTES per week. Multiple documents were required weekly by the South Korean government for COVID-19 safety.

title: Multi-stage Compressor Design
description: My team and I designed and optimized a multi-stage compressor using computational modeling and fluid dynamics simulation to meet specific criteria.

title: Alternative BECCS Process
description: Is it feasible to get energy from common bio-waste in a carbon negative process? We pyrolized common food waste like walnut shells to make biochar at varying high temperatures (gassification) to optimize properties as fuel.
